text:
Cognology | Melbourne, Australia | Full-time | ONSITE | Web Developer

We're a HR software company looking for awesome web developers to join our team to help build products that will change the future of work.

Tech: C#, ASP.NET, Angular, MSSQL, Git, microservices, CQRS, event sourcing

Apply here: http://www.cognology.com.au/jobs/

Graduates are welcome!
